txt.en: Shrieks of Merrevail can be heard in the hills above
Corrupted Orcs patrol the path ahead, searching for intruders
The peaceful village of the Red Sky Clan is now filled with vile Orc taunts of victory
'Ghai-buri-Sêk try to fight. Too many of them!'
'They have taken our home from us!'
<u>Trouble at Bhol Rûdh</u>\n\qHome to the Red Sky Clan, the village of Bhol Rûdh sits isolated, and with little defences, at the end of a long mountain path.\q
'As the good harvest, you have saved our home!'
'Keep what you have gathered, for it will be your moon on a clouded night.'
